Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP38.client.GUIComponents

Class StartPanel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP38.client.GUIComponents.StartPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class StartPanel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
This class contains all the methods needed to create the panel with the preliminary settings of the game
Author:
Davide Mantegazza (10568661)

    void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
    Invoked when an action occurs.
    javax.swing.JPanel createButtonPanel()
    This method is used to create the panel that contains the button used to submit the inputted data and connect to the server
    javax.swing.JPanel createControlPanel()
    This method is used to generate the panel that contains the text fields used to input the server's IP address, the player's nickname and the player's age
    javax.swing.JPanel createStartPanel​(GameModeGUI gmg)
    This method is used to create the main panel for the initial settings of the game

    • createControlPanel

      public javax.swing.JPanel createControlPanel()
      This method is used to generate the panel that contains the text fields used to input the server's IP address, the player's nickname and the player's age
      Returns:
